subject: Productivity
title: The 10-10-10 Rule
description: Learn The 10-10-10 Rule in one minute.

hook.text: Before deciding, ask: how will I feel about this in 10 minutes, 10 months, and 10 years?

buildup.text: Suzy Welch created this framework to escape the tyranny of short-term emotions.

discovery.text: The rule forces time-perspective shifting. What feels urgent now often vanishes in the 10-year view.

twist.text: It also catches the opposite: decisions that feel fine now but create pain for your future self.

climax.text: The best decisions balance all three timeframes. Ignoring any one of them creates blind spots.

quiz.question: What does the 10-10-10 Rule ask you to consider?
options: How you'll feel in 10 minutes, 10 months, and 10 years
Ten alternative options for every decision
The opinions of ten different people
